definition:
Definition {#definition .unnumbered}
==========

A topological space is said to be *Lindelöf* if every open cover has a
countable subcover.

Notes {#notes .unnumbered}
=====

A second-countable space is Lindelöf. A compact space is Lindelöf.

A Lindelöf space is .

in Lindelöf spaces are Lindelöf. Continuous images of Lindelöf spaces
are Lindelöf.

A Lindelöf space is compact if and only if it is countably compact.
